sections.heading: Understanding Digital Marketing
sections.body: Digital marketing encompasses all marketing efforts that use the internet or an electronic device. Businesses leverage digital channels such as search engines, social media, email, and websites to connect with current and prospective customers. With the rise of technology, many companies are shifting from traditional marketing methods to digital strategies. This transition is particularly relevant in Nigeria, where internet penetration is increasing exponentially. Understanding the fundamentals of digital marketing is crucial for any business looking to thrive in this digital age.
